title: The Bagel Shop
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pretty typical bagel shop. Vegan items include all bagels and breads, fruit salad, green salads, some of the raw juices and a veggie sandwich which can be made vegan by substituting the cheese with avocado.
streetAddress: Belisario Dominguez 291, Zona Central, La Paz, BCS
